verses.verse: Now it came <S%H1961><s%> about, when <S%H3588><s%> men <S%H120><s%> began <S%H2490><s%> to multiply <S%H7231><s%> on the face <S%H6440><s%> of the land, <S%H127><s%> and daughters <S%H1323><s%> were born <S%H3205><s%> to them,

that the sons <S%H1121><s%> of God <S%H430><s%> saw <S%H7200><s%> that the daughters <S%H1323><s%> of men <S%H120><s%> were beautiful; <S%H2896><s%> and they took <S%H3947><s%> wives <S%H802><s%> for themselves, whomever <S%H3605><s%> <S%H834><s%> they chose. <S%H977><s%>

Then the Lord <S%H3068><s%> said, <S%H559><s%> "My Spirit <S%H7307><s%> shall not strive <S%H1777><s%> with man <S%H120><s%> forever, <S%H5769><s%> because <S%H7683><s%> he also <S%H7683><s%> is flesh; <S%H1320><s%> nevertheless his days <S%H3117><s%> shall be one hundred <S%H3967><s%> and twenty <S%H6242><s%> years. <S%H8141><s%>"

The Nephilim <S%H5303><s%> were on the earth <S%H776><s%> in those <S%H1992><s%> days, <S%H3117><s%> and also <S%H1571><s%> afterward, <S%H310><s%> <S%H3651><s%> when <S%H834><s%> the sons <S%H1121><s%> of God <S%H430><s%> came <S%H935><s%> in to the daughters <S%H1323><s%> of men, <S%H120><s%> and they bore <S%H3205><s%> [children] to them. Those <S%H1992><s%> were the mighty <S%H1368><s%> men <S%H1368><s%> who <S%H834><s%> [were] of old, <S%H5769><s%> men <S%H376><s%> of renown. <S%H8034><s%>

Then the Lord <S%H3068><s%> saw <S%H7200><s%> that the wickedness <S%H9567><s%> of man <S%H120><s%> was great <S%H7227><s%> on the earth, <S%H776><s%> and that every <S%H3605><s%> intent <S%H3336><s%> of the thoughts <S%H4284><s%> of his heart <S%H3820><s%> was only <S%H7534><s%> evil <S%H7451><s%> continually. <S%H3605><s%> <S%H3117><s%>
And the Lord <S%H3068><s%> was sorry <S%H5162><s%> that He had made <S%H6213><s%> man <S%H120><s%> on the earth, <S%H776><s%> and He was grieved <S%H6087><s%> in His heart. <S%H3820><s%>

And the Lord <S%H3068><s%> said, <S%H559><s%> "I will blot <S%H4229><s%> out man <S%H120><s%> whom <S%H834><s%> I have created <S%H1254><s%> from the face <S%H6440><s%> of the land, <S%H127><s%> from man <S%H120><s%> to animals <S%H929><s%> to creeping <S%H7431><s%> things <S%H7431><s%> and to birds <S%H5775><s%> of the sky; <S%H8064><s%> for I am <S%H5162><s%> sorry <S%H5162><s%> that I have made <S%H6213><s%> them."
But Noah <S%H5146><s%> found <S%H4672><s%> favor <S%H2580><s%> in the eyes <S%H5869><s%> of the Lord. <S%H3068><s%>

These <S%H428><s%> are [the records of] the generations <S%H8435><s%> of Noah. <S%H5146><s%> Noah <S%H5146><s%> was a righteous <S%H6662><s%> man, <S%H376><s%> blameless <S%H8549><s%> in his time; <S%H1755><s%> Noah <S%H5146><s%> walked <S%H1980><s%> with God. <S%H430><s%>
And Noah <S%H5146><s%> became <S%H3205><s%> the father <S%H3205><s%> of three <S%H7969><s%> sons: <S%H1121><s%> Shem, <S%H8035><s%> Ham, <S%H2526><s%> and Japheth. <S%H3315><s%>
Now the earth <S%H776><s%> was corrupt <S%H7843><s%> in the sight <S%H6440><s%> of God, <S%H430><s%> and the earth <S%H776><s%> was filled <S%H4390><s%> with violence. <S%H2555><s%>

And God <S%H430><s%> looked <S%H7200><s%> on the earth, <S%H776><s%> and behold, <S%H2009><s%> it was corrupt; <S%H7843><s%> for all <S%H3605><s%> flesh <S%H1320><s%> had corrupted <S%H7843><s%> their way <S%H1870><s%> upon the earth. <S%H776><s%>

Then God <S%H430><s%> said <S%H559><s%> to Noah, <S%H5146><s%> "The end <S%H7093><s%> of all <S%H3605><s%> flesh <S%H1320><s%> has come <S%H935><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> Me; for the earth <S%H776><s%> is filled <S%H4390><s%> with violence <S%H2555><s%> because <S%H4480><s%> <S%H6440><s%> of them; and behold, <S%H2009><s%> I am about to destroy <S%H7843><s%> them with the earth. <S%H776><s%>

"Make <S%H6213><s%> for yourself an ark <S%H8392><s%> of gopher <S%H1613><s%> wood; <S%H6086><s%> you shall make <S%H6213><s%> the ark <S%H8392><s%> with rooms, <S%H7064><s%> and shall cover <S%H9216><s%> it inside <S%H4480><s%> <S%H1004><s%> and out with pitch. <S%H9217><s%>

"And this <S%H2088><s%> is how <S%H834><s%> you shall make <S%H6213><s%> it: the length <S%H753><s%> of the ark <S%H8392><s%> three <S%H7969><s%> hundred <S%H3967><s%> cubits, <S%H520><s%> its breadth <S%H7341><s%> fifty <S%H2572><s%> cubits, <S%H520><s%> and its height <S%H6967><s%> thirty <S%H7970><s%> cubits. <S%H520><s%>

"You shall make <S%H6213><s%> a window <S%H9472><s%> for the ark, <S%H8392><s%> and finish <S%H3615><s%> it to a cubit <S%H520><s%> from the top; <S%H4605><s%> and set <S%H7760><s%> the door <S%H6607><s%> of the ark <S%H8392><s%> in the side <S%H6654><s%> of it; you shall make <S%H6213><s%> it with lower, <S%H8482><s%> second, <S%H8145><s%> and third <S%H7992><s%> decks.

"And behold, <S%H2009><s%> I, even I am bringing <S%H935><s%> the flood <S%H3999><s%> of water <S%H4325><s%> upon the earth, <S%H776><s%> to destroy <S%H7843><s%> all <S%H3605><s%> flesh <S%H1320><s%> in which <S%H834><s%> is the breath <S%H7307><s%> of life, <S%H9132><s%> from under <S%H8478><s%> heaven; <S%H8064><s%> everything <S%H3605><s%> that is on the earth <S%H776><s%> shall perish. <S%H1478><s%>

"But I will establish <S%H6965><s%> My covenant <S%H1285><s%> with you; and you shall enter <S%H935><s%> the ark <S%H8392><s%> â€“ you and your sons <S%H1121><s%> and your wife, <S%H802><s%> and your sons' wives <S%H802><s%> with you.

"And of every <S%H3605><s%> living <S%H2416><s%> thing <S%H2416><s%> of all <S%H3605><s%> flesh, <S%H1320><s%> you shall bring <S%H935><s%> two <S%H8147><s%> of every <S%H3605><s%> [kind] into the ark, <S%H8392><s%> to keep <S%H2421><s%> [them] alive <S%H2421><s%> with you; they shall be male <S%H2145><s%> and female. <S%H5347><s%>

"Of the birds <S%H5775><s%> after their kind, <S%H4327><s%> and of the animals <S%H929><s%> after their kind, <S%H4327><s%> of every <S%H3605><s%> creeping <S%H7431><s%> thing <S%H7431><s%> of the ground <S%H127><s%> after its kind, <S%H4327><s%> two <S%H8147><s%> of every <S%H3605><s%> [kind] shall come <S%H935><s%> to you to keep <S%H2421><s%> [them] alive. <S%H2421><s%>

"And as for you, take <S%H3947><s%> for yourself some <S%H4480><s%> of all <S%H3605><s%> food <S%H3978><s%> which <S%H834><s%> is edible, <S%H398><s%> and gather <S%H622><s%> [it] to yourself; and it shall be for food <S%H402><s%> for you and for them."
Thus Noah <S%H5146><s%> did; <S%H6213><s%> according to all <S%H3605><s%> that God <S%H430><s%> had commanded <S%H6680><s%> him, so <S%H3651><s%> he did. <S%H6213><s%>
